description:
Description
===========

Doc fix: Insert missing word "call" on line 7 of /nova/api-guide/source/faults.rst. The text currently reads: 

  Every HTTP request has a status code. 2xx codes signify the API was a success.

Suggest inserting the word "call" to improve readability:

  Every HTTP request has a status code. 2xx codes signify the API call was a success.
title: Doc fix in Nova API Guide: faults.rst, insert missing word 'call'

comments.content:
Description
===========

Doc fix: Insert missing word "call" on line 7 of /nova/api-guide/source/faults.rst. The text currently reads: 

  Every HTTP request has a status code. 2xx codes signify the API was a success.

Suggest inserting the word "call" to improve readability:

  Every HTTP request has a status code. 2xx codes signify the API call was a success.

comments.content: You don't need to write a bug report for that. Rather, you should just provide a change and discuss with the API subteam about your change, that's it.
